medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began 3 weeks prior to the visit, with 4 episodes of palpitations and chest discomfort occurring both at rest and with exertion. Following 2 episodes, the patient went to the emergency department. Symptoms have gradually improved with treatment.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Anxiety since early childhood, previously treated with various antidepressants without improvement, but significantly improved with clonazepam. No other past medical or surgical history mentioned.
medical_history.family_history: Biological family history is unknown due to adoption.
medical_history.social_history: Frequent social drinker who has decreased alcohol use as it worsened panic symptoms. Smokes up to 1 pack of cigarettes daily.
